#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

void floyd(int n, int graph[201][201], int dist[201][201])
{

 int i,j,k;

 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  for(j=0;j<n;j++)
   dist[i][j]=graph[i][j];

 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
  for(j=0;j<n;j++)
  {
    for(k=0;k<n;k++)
    {
    if(dist[j][i] + dist[i][k] < dist[j][k])
    { //cout<< " connecting "<<j <<"and "<<k<<" is the road "<<i<<endl;
    dist[j][k] = dist[j][i] + dist[i][k];
    }
    }
   }
  }
}

int main()
{
int num,i,j;
int test;
cin>>test;
while(test--)
{
cin>>num;
char k;
int graph[201][201], aux[201][201];
for(i=0;i<num;i++)
{
 for(j=0;j<num;j++)
 {
  cin>>k;
  if(k=='Y')
  graph[i][j]=1;
  else
  graph[i][j]=99999;
 }
}

floyd(num,graph,aux);
int que,a,b;
cin>>que;
while(que--)
{
 cin>>a>>b;
 if(a==b)
 cout<<"0\n";
 else
 cout<<aux[a][b]<<endl;
}
}
return 0;
}
